title: Fetch United States Congressional Records (1995-Present)
text: function queries Congressional Record collection given congressional session date range. retrieves speeches House Senate, processes associated metadata, returns results structured tibble. supports optional limits number speeches collected. default, date_from date_to specified, function automatically sets date range based congressional session provided. function fetches full speech content retrieving parsing associated granules GovInfo API.

title: Fetch United States Congressional Records (1995-Present)
text: date_from date_to omitted, function uses preset start end dates sessions 104th (1995–1997) 118th (2023–2025) Congress. unsupported session specified without dates, error raised. function paginates API results using nextOffsetMark system. retrieved speech cleaned, parsed, formatted inclusion final tibble. following helper functions expected available correctly implemented: get_search_results() get_granules() get_granule_summary() get_htm_content() process_speech()
